sentences.en: "Of course I don't know her," Roger snapped.
sentences.cn: 罗杰恶声恶气地说：“我当然不认识她。”

sentences.en: Cassandra withdrew her hand from Roger's.
sentences.cn: 卡桑德拉将手从罗杰手里抽了回来。

sentences.en: Give Roger another pint, Imogen, and I'll have the same again.
sentences.cn: 再给罗杰来一杯，伊莫金，我也再来一份同样的。

sentences.en: In 1952 she wed film director Roger Vadim.
sentences.cn: 1952年她嫁给了电影导演罗杰·瓦丹。

sentences.en: Ivan Lendl coasted to a 6-3, 6-2, 6-3 victory over Roger Rasheed.
sentences.cn: 伊万·伦德尔以6：3，6：2和6：3的比分轻松战胜了罗杰·拉希德。

sentences.en: Now, now Roger, I'm sure you didn't mean it but that remark was in very poor taste.
sentences.cn: 算了，罗杰，我肯定你不是那个意思，但那话太难听了。

sentences.en: Roger can't make up his mind whether to go to college or get a job. You can't eat your cake and have it, too.
sentences.cn: 罗杰下不了决心是上大学还是找工作, 两者不可兼得.

sentences.en: Roger Hardy of the BBC looks at this latest twist in the political crisis in Algeria.
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司的罗杰·哈迪就阿尔及利亚政治危机的这一最新转机作出解析。

sentences.en: Roger is a very sociable person.
sentences.cn: 罗杰是个非常好交际的人.

sentences.en: Roger Kingdom set the world record of 12.92 seconds.
sentences.cn: 罗杰·金德姆创造了12.92秒的世界纪录。

sentences.en: Roger looked at her with distaste.
Roger Neuberg writes in a simple and understandable way.
sentences.cn: 罗杰·纽伯格的文章简明易懂。

sentences.en: Roger swivelled his head to look at her.
The policeman heard the message on the radio, said " roger ", and drove to the scene of the crime.
sentences.cn: 警察听到无线信息后说 “ 已收到 ”, 然后开车到犯罪现场.

phrases.tran_cn: 海盗旗（饰有白色骷髅的黑旗）
罗杰·克莱门斯（一位活跃于1980年代至2000年代的美国职棒大联盟的投手，外号“火箭人”）
罗杰·费德勒（瑞士网球巨星）
